entry.title: Long Blog Post
entry.summary: We've deployed documentation as a test on Github Pages using the Docusaurus framework, that is built on React. There are enough features-certainly more than we need-so we will likely stick with this moving on.
entry.content: We've deployed documentation as a test on Github Pages using the Docusaurus framework, that is built on React. There are enough features-certainly more than we need-so we will likely stick with this moving on.
